named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTaskLog.readByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTaskLog( taskLog.id,taskLog.name,taskLog.actualOwner,taskLog.status ) FROM AuditTaskImpl taskLog WHERE taskLog.processId = :processId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTaskLog.readByProcessInstanceId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTaskLog( taskLog.id,taskLog.name,taskLog.actualOwner,taskLog.status ) FROM AuditTaskImpl taskLog WHERE taskLog.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTaskLog.countByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(taskLog) FROM AuditTaskImpl taskLog WHERE taskLog.processId = :processId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTaskLog.countByProcessInstanceId
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(taskLog) FROM AuditTaskImpl taskLog WHERE taskLog.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId
